Seminars and papers:

Bitcoin Transaction Malleability

title:

Bitcoin Transaction Malleability

descrip.

A seminar talk about Bitcoin's Transaction Malleability, an example of a security issue in the Bitcoin global cryptocurrency system.

tags:

cryptocurrency

bitcoin

malleability-attack

Mt.Gox incident

The Banach-Tarski paradox

title:

The Banach-Tarski paradox

descrip.

One of the seminar talks I presented at University of Tours, about the Banach-Tarsky Paradox, one of the most famous and disturbing results in mathematics.

tags:

Pathology

Non-measurable_sets

Axiom_of_choice

Banach_Tarski

Wild automorphisms of the complex field

title:

Wild automorphisms of the complex field

descrip.

A fun little presentation I made during my bachelor degree I think, exploring the dark parts of the group of automorphisms of the complex field.

tags:

Pathology

Wild_automorphisms

Zorn's_Lemma

complex_automorphisms

Hilbert's 5th problem

title:

Hilbert's 5th problem

descrip.

Probably one of the first short talks I gave during my Differential geometry class, this one is about characterizing linear Lie groups by Von Neumann's theorem (actually, in the case of closed linear topological groups.)

tags:

Lie_groups

Hilbert_problem

differentiable_manifolds

The Octahedral group

title:

The Octahedral group

descrip.

Little presentation about the study of the isometry group of the Octahedron.

tags:

Octahedral_group

isometry_group

Octahedron
